Here's a link to the [about](about.html) page.


You can also still use R!

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

plot_df =
  tibble(
    x = runif(100),
    y = 1 + 2 * x + rnorm(100)
  )


plot_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
```
